name: Jack Thompson
story: Benjamin Dorgan joined the military at a young age, driven by a desire to serve his country. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his dedication and bravery on the battlefield. Despite his calm demeanor, he is fiercely loyal to his comrades and will stop at nothing to ensure their safety. His expertise as an ammo bearer has saved countless lives, and he continues to be an invaluable asset to his unit.
